name: hn-special
description: A theme and extension for Hacker News that improves the look and feel and adds some interesting features.

scripts.css: npx stylus -c ./lib/extras/hn_theme_light.styl && npx stylus -c ./lib/extras/hn_theme_dark.styl && npx stylus -c ./lib/extras/hn_theme_light_contrast.styl
scripts.build: npm run css && npx web-ext build
scripts.build:dev: npm run css && npx web-ext run

author: Gabriele Cirulli and Daniel Jost
